name: Free Plan
content: Free Plan - $0/month. Perfect for getting started. Features: 1 project, 100 API calls per day, Basic analytics, Email support, Community access. Limitations: No team members, No integrations, 7-day data retention. Ideal for individual developers exploring the platform.

name: Starter Plan
content: Starter Plan - $29/month or $290/year (save 17% annually). Great for small teams. Features: 5 projects, 1,000 API calls per day, Advanced analytics, 3 team members, Slack integration, Email support, 30-day data retention. Limitations: No priority support, No SSO. Best for small teams and startups getting serious about their projects.

name: Pro Plan
content: Pro Plan - $99/month or $990/year (save 17% annually). Our most popular plan for growing businesses. Features: Unlimited projects, 10,000 API calls per day, Full analytics suite, 10 team members, All integrations, Priority email support, Chat support, 90-day data retention, Custom branding. Limitations: No dedicated support, No SLA guarantee. Recommended for growing businesses with demanding workloads.

name: Enterprise Plan
content: Enterprise Plan - Custom pricing (annual billing). For large organizations with advanced needs. Features: Unlimited everything, Custom API limits, Dedicated success manager, Phone support, 99.9% SLA guarantee, SSO/SAML authentication, Custom integrations, Unlimited data retention, On-premise deployment option, Security audit reports. Contact sales@acme.com to discuss your requirements and get a custom quote.

name: Extra API Calls
content: Extra API Calls Add-on - $10 per 1,000 calls. Purchase additional API calls beyond your plan limit. Useful when you need more API capacity without upgrading your plan. Calls are added to your monthly allowance and reset each billing cycle.

name: Extra Storage
content: Extra Storage Add-on - $5 per 10GB/month. Additional storage for files and data beyond your plan's included storage. Storage is billed monthly and can be added or removed at any time. Perfect for teams with large file storage needs.

name: Priority Support
content: Priority Support Add-on - $49/month. Get guaranteed 4-hour response time and access to a dedicated support queue. Includes priority handling of all support tickets, direct escalation path, and faster resolution times. Available for Starter and Pro plans.
